custom-sql.sql:
SELECT citymap.companyId, citymap.groupId, citymap.userId, citymap.userName,
citymap.mapId, citymap.mapTypeId, citymap.mapImageId, citymap.mapName, citymap.mapDesc,
citymap.createDate, citymap.modifiedDate
FROM citymap
WHERE (citymap.mapName LIKE ?)
AND (citymap.groupId = ?)
AND (citymap.mapTypeId = ?)
ORDER BY citymap.mapName ASC
